post:
<center>![AlphaVPS](https://blackfriday.alphavps.com/assets/img/bf-2021-header.png "")</center>

Hello all,

BlackFriday 2021 is finally here!

I am very happy to present you with AlphaVPS's special BlackFriday 2021 Event! These specials will last from now, until 1st of Dec or while stock lasts. Whichever comes first! Once they are gone - they are gone, so be very quick! Some of the services and locations have VERY limited stock, meaning they will be sold out in a matter of hours.

**About us:**
[AlphaVPS](https://alphavps.com) is a leading IaaS provider in Europe, offering [Premium Cloud VPS](https://alphavps.com/high-performance-vps.html "Premium Cloud VPS"), [Dedicated Servers](https://alphavps.com/dedicated-servers.html "Dedicated Servers"), [Colocation](https://alphavps.com/colocation.html "Colocation"), Connectivity, and custom solutions out of 5 worldwide locations. Operating since 2013 and based out of Europe. Our offices are located in Sofia, Bulgaria. We are staffed around the clock and our team is fully in-house with zero outsourcing. We run our network under AS203380, own our hardware and our Sofia office is located inside the Telepoint DataCenter in our flagship Sofia location, just above our equipment. <br><br>

----------------------------

<br><br><center> 
# We have a dedicated page, with these deals (and more!) over at: https://blackfriday.alphavps.com/ </center><br><br>

----------------------------

<br>**This year - just like the previous - we're going to be doing flash sales in this sales thread with super limited quantity deals, make sure you follow it closely!**

**Before we begin, a quick general FAQ:**
* All pricing is in EUR
* All pricing is VAT Excl, unless otherwise stated
* VAT will be charged to EU residents, living outside of Bulgaria, with no valid VAT number. VAT will not be charged to customers from outside the EU.
* All Black Friday sales are non-refundable and come with limited support
* All orders need to contain valid contact information, otherwise will be rejected.
* All Black Friday specials can not be transferred. Please do not buy with the intention to resell - that's not going to happen this time around. Changing account details with the intention to transfer would also not be possible and would render the service to be terminated.
* All orders are subject to a manual review. Anonymous orders are not allowed. 
* Orders with fake addresses with the intention to avoid VAT would be rejected. Further orders won't be allowed
* All orders are set up after a review - they are not instantly set up. In all cases, you will receive your server in a very timely matter. Dedicated servers deployment is between 1 hour and 24 hours.
* VPS Offers do not come with a dedicated CPU. These are fair shares.
* Custom ISO is possible, via a ticket for any KVM plan
* These are not intended to replace existing services. That being said - we can't help you migrate from one service to another.
* These offers are not upgradeable. Choose wisely - we won't be able to upgrade/downgrade you are a later stage!
* Orders not paid within 15 minutes will be canceled.

<center>**Let's get the party started!**</center><br>

----------------------------

<br><center>**Cheap VPS BF-2021 Deals**</center>
These are based on Dual E5 host nodes with RAID10 pure SSD storage, on **OpenVZ 7**. A perfect starting point! They come with 1x IPv4 and /64 IPv6. Available in 5 locations - **Los Angeles, New York, London, Nuremberg and Sofia**.

<br><center>**KVM Storage Servers in Sofia, Bulgaria. RAID60 HDD KVMs**</center>

We're also running a very special offer on storage servers, in Bulgaria:
**Pre-pay for 12 months and get 1 month free** (pay for 12 and get 13), as long as you mention "**LET-BF-2021**" in the order notes! Applies to all plans above 256GB:


768MB RAM - 256GB HDD - 1x vCPU - 1TB Bandwidth - 25€/y - [ORDER NOW](https://alphavps.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=245)  
1GB RAM - 512GB HDD - 2x vCPU - 1.5TB Bandwidth - 42€/y - [ORDER NOW](https://alphavps.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=244)   
2GB RAM - 1TB HDD - 2x vCPU - 3TB Bandwidth - 60€/y- [ORDER NOW](https://alphavps.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=243) 

**The offer is valid only between 24th Nov 2021 and 1st Dec 2021, or until stock lasts!**
<br><br>

----------------------------

<br><center>**Powerful Dedicated Servers in Europe**</center>

We have some very limited specials available for very quick deployment in Sofia, Bulgaria. All of our Dedicated Servers come with the following:
* 1Gbit/s port
* Private VLAN
* Control panel for automatic reinstalls and server network graphs
* Power controls (shutdown, boot, and reboot) within the control panel
* IPMI Access by request, behind a firewall (Except L5630 servers)
* /30 of IPv4 and /64 of IPv6
* Setup between 1 hour and 24 hours
<br>
